SELECT U.US_ID, RE.MR_NUMBER, U.US_NAME, U.US_SEX, D.DI_NAME SEX, U.US_AGE, U.US_BLOODTYPE, I.DI_NAME BLOOD, U.US_BIRTHDAY, U.US_PHONE, U.US_ADDRESS, U.US_NATIVEPLACE, U.US_CREATE_TIME
FROM T_USER U LEFT JOIN T_DICT D ON D.DI_CODE = U.US_SEX AND D.DI_TYPE = 'SEX' LEFT JOIN T_DICT I ON I.DI_CODE = U.US_BLOODTYPE AND I.DI_TYPE = 'BLOODTYPE' LEFT JOIN T_MEC_RECORD RE ON RE.MR_CA_ID = U.US_ID
AND U.US_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{name},'%'))
AND U.US_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{tel},'%'))
AND U.US_CREATE_TIME >= TO_DATE(CONCAT( #{start} ,' 00:00:00'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND U.US_CREATE_TIME <= TO_DATE(CONCAT( #{end} ,' 23:59:59'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND RE.MR_NUMBER = #{number}
ORDER BY U.US_ID ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT U.US_ID, RE.MR_NUMBER, U.US_NAME, U.US_SEX, D.DI_NAME SEX, U.US_AGE, U.US_BLOODTYPE, I.DI_NAME BLOOD, U.US_BIRTHDAY, U.US_PHONE, U.US_ADDRESS, U.US_NATIVEPLACE, U.US_CREATE_TIME FROM T_USER U LEFT JOIN T_DICT D ON D.DI_CODE = U.US_SEX AND D.DI_TYPE = 'SEX' LEFT JOIN T_DICT I ON I.DI_CODE = U.US_BLOODTYPE AND I.DI_TYPE = 'BLOODTYPE' LEFT JOIN T_MEC_RECORD RE ON RE.MR_CA_ID = U.US_ID
AND U.US_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{name},'%'))
AND U.US_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{tel},'%'))
AND U.US_CREATE_TIME >= TO_DATE(CONCAT( #{start} ,' 00:00:00'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND U.US_CREATE_TIME <= TO_DATE(CONCAT( #{end} ,' 23:59:59'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND RE.MR_NUMBER = #{number}
)
